description: This file is a header defining internal API functions for the TLS Record Client object, including function prototypes for accepting, receiving, and sending TLS records.

methods.name: TlsRcoAccept
methods.description: Prototype for function to accept a TLS record buffer.

methods.name: TlsRcoRecv
methods.description: Prototype for function to receive TLS record data.

methods.name: TlsRcoSend
methods.description: Prototype for function to send TLS record data.
